name: Jason Nomof
text: Always an awesome experience with friendly and smart staff

name: Cameron Brooks
text: I would like to thank the Ken Pratt team for their continued customer service they have provided to my family and I. After a couple of small slips ups the team members stood behind their brand and took care of us. This, along with the ‚Ä¶More

name: Miesha Paulino
text: Overall, the pizza was delicious and filling. The crust was not too thin and not too thick, and perfectly cooked. The sauce tasted unique although I prefer a bit more spice in my sauce. Good and efficient service too

name: Andrew Montoya
text: After a bad experience at another pizza place trying to feed our hungry, exhausted family upon returning from a multi-day camping trip, we ordered from Toppers. With the deals that were running, I assumed the quality wouldn't be very high, ‚Ä¶More

name: Rylan Hughes
text: Burnt circle of disappointment.

name: Earlie Richards
text: We returned to eat at the same place where we had two years ago. The pizzas were delicious as were then. The atmosphere is very pleasant And the prices are reasonable.

name: A Jackson
text: Best so far in town for us. I wish I had taken pics. I will next time. Great delivery driver. Pizza and Mac were above average. Got both for less than $20 delivered in under an hour on a Friday night. We will be ordering again.

name: Frosty X
text: Great and cheap pizza. You can select from the house menu of which pizza you may think it's good or sounds tasty. Non greasy and less salty.

name: Alonzo Goggins
text:
I don‚Äôt want to beat this place down and want to write it off as a ‚ÄúMiss.‚Äù
The toppings were fantastic but the sauce was extremely sour. Roommate tried it and agreed. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mojo Rizn
text: So intensely salty I had to trash it. Super gross. Should've heeded others warning. I can't get this nasty aftertaste out of my mouth. Never again. ‚Ä¶More

name: Emily Mohni
text: Amazing food, and great atmosphere!! DEFINITELY GO ABOVE AND BEYOND EVERY TIME! I LOVE WORKING THERE AND I'M SO HAPPY WITH THE FAMILY I'VE CREATED THERE! Until ya know. They blind you and fire you after you have a miscarriage. So ya.

name: Andy Herrera
text: This is the second time they got my order wrong. Its like they do it on purpose. I like this pizza but this is becoming a habit for them, I will give them one last chance before I change this rating to 1 star. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mariel Hansen
text: All the people leaving one or two stars don't know what they're talking about....just ordered a pizza from Toppers for the first time tonight and it was delicious!!!! We had half Smoky BBQ and half Maui Topper and it was so good. Perfect ‚Ä¶More

text: Price was fair and pizza was thin and crispy the way we like it.

name: Matt W
text: Pretty good pizza. Way better than Pizza Hut and Domino's.

name: Krystal Leggett
text: Was a big fan of their Northern Longmont location!! BEST PIZZA DEALS too! Great dipping sauces & toppings selections. I get get more for my $ here. ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Thorpe
text: I am a pizza guy.  I love it.  I had heard so much about toppers.  I had to try it.  Boy was I wrong,  the pizza is pretty tasteless dry and processed.  I called back after trying to eat the pizza we paid good money for and was treated as ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff van Geete
text: Don't worry about the 1-star reviews on here.  Those guys are talking like their the Gordon Ramsey's of the cheap-deal pizza chain world. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michaela Aiken
text: Pizza is on par with Dominoes, Little Caesars etc. but at a higher price.  For the price I'm paying I can get a good pizza from one of the local shops.  Was hoping they would be better because they are in a  convenient location to our house, but I'll be making the extra drive to go elsewhere.

name: Mister Dupeep
text: Great prices, Great website, great pizza. Don't expect the pie to remain very good after an hour though, the quality drops incredibly steep once this pizza needs a reheat. Catch this within the first thirty minutes though and damn is it a great pizza.

name: Michael J
text: Toppers Pizza is my favorite pizza in town. We have always had a good experience with them. I also like that they are open late. Not many late night options in this town.

name: John Otto
text: Pizza arrived and seemed like it had long been removed from the oven and had plenty of time to dry and get hard.  Not the worst pizza we've had, but pretty close.  The value was pretty poor also - a pizza, breadstix and small wings for $46 including delivery tip seems a little high especially since we didn't get our entire order.

name: Marth Roy
text: Got a raw pizza....that can be very dangerous and make people extremely sick!! Luckily I barely ate any but I‚Äôm now really worried that I‚Äôm going to get sick. If you do get pizza here check if it‚Äôs raw first so you don‚Äôt risk getting sick. Not going back because I don‚Äôt think that it‚Äôs worth the risk

name: Lance Cayko
text: Terrible customer service.  Pizza Hut and Dominoes are a much better option as a result.

name: Gabrielle Campbell
text: I love the pizza here, it's a great environment! Plus when you use the deals they have going on it's pretty fair priced!

name: Kristan H.
text: This was the worst experience I've ever had with a pizza delivery. Not only was the pizza late, but it arrived cold. The pizza was rubbery and not even tasty. I'd leave 0 stars if I could. Wish I'd read the reviews before placing an order ‚Ä¶More

name: Erin Mcdonnell
text: We've been Toppers customers ever since we moved to Longmont. We loved their pizza and prices but lately they've been getting sloppy. Our pizzas are missing toppings, extra sauces ordered are missing, wrong drinks delivered, no drink delivered. I don't think we can order from them anymore. Too bad, it was good once.

name: Kat B
text: I've ordered from toppers multiple times (all been great) but this time in particular, our delivery man was SOOO NICE! Like, made my night nice. I'm so mad I didn't catch his name but he was an older man (white hair) and I wish I got it so ‚Ä¶More

text: People were really nice,  but the crust was over cooked and very tough, flavor of cardboard, I paid for extra cheese, the cheese was so sparce that one third to half of it had no cheese at all.

name: Lucy Furr

text: It took 1 hour to get a cold, rubbery, disgusting pizza. Bad first impression. I will never order from here again.

text: I've been waiting 6 years for them to expand to CO. Best chain pizza in the country, hands down. Prices are high, but their deals make it cheap.
